segments.text: After probation , you'll find that our silk products feels more comfortable than others .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about this product selling from last month on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's selling like hot cakes , and we have lots of regulars now . Would you like to place a trial order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am . Well , can I have a try of the sample free of charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have the free samples for customers . And you can have a try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . We'll order once we try the sample .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a moment and fill out the order form . And we'll send you our sample .
segments.speaker: S1
